name: skin.essence
body:
### What is it?
Essence is a skin for the cross-platform media center solution name [XBMC](http://xbmc.org). The goal of Essence is to provide a simple and high degree of customization's in an elegant skin.

* Made for 1080p.
* "Live-Preivew" of how the different skin options affect the skin.
* Most features are options that can be disabled/enabled by the user for those with low-end hardware.
* Different sets of styles available, with a beautiful dark/glass as default. More sets to be available for download.

### Authors and Contributors
Essence is the fruit of @orecus with contributions from @francescotili. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Essence? Check out the issues page if it's a known issue, if not feel free to add it as an issue or check it the feature you badly want already is in the roadmap!

You can also post on our forum thread on [XBMC.org](http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?tid=142853).
